participant_1.background:
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
i am from california.
I love to create, whether it's for work or for my own enjoyment.
chocolate chip cookies are the tastier things in my opinion.
I met a new friend at the gym today who shared my love of writing.

participant_2.background:
I dress for my audience.
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.
i enjoy hanging out with friends and family.
my dad owns a appliance store that i do not want to inherit.
i own 30 pairs of shoes.

content.text: Happy Birthday! How are you celebrating?
Thank you! I'm going out to dinner with my family and friends.
That sounds like fun! I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
That's funny! I don't like tomatoes either.
I'm from California. What about you?
Oh, cool! I've never been to Texas.
I'd love to! I love to travel.
Me too! I love seeing new places and meeting new people.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends and family, go to the gym, and write.
I love to write too! I met a new friend at the gym today who shared my love of writing.
That's awesome! Writing is such a great way to express yourself.
I agree! It's also a great way to connect with others.
I love that. I'm glad you're a writer too.
Me too! I'm always looking for new writing buddies.
I'm always up for meeting new people.
Great! We should exchange contact information
